duties_responsibilities.duty: Leading penetration tests and security assessments
Representing the company in key client relationships
Overseeing larger, often strategic projects and providing advice and guidance to the team
Leading service teams and acting as regional technical representatives with flagship clients
Participating in research, coordinating and supporting research performed by other team members

education_certification.credential: 3+ years of experience performing and leading penetration tests in areas such as application security, cloud security, network security, and mobile security
Experience with programming, systems administration, or blue team activities will be beneficial
Relevant certifications such as OSCP, CRTO, OSEP, CCT APP/INF, and cloud certifications
